name: Crash Cam
description:
Download the @FreeAppADay.com Store App and wish for more top rated
apps like Crash Cam to be featured on FAAD!

Welcome to Hollywood! You're the hottest director in town!! So take your camera & your rockin' tag-along actor (Mr. A-List Anthony) through crazy film sets using simple 1 touch controls.

Avoid obstacles (they will KILL your battery), collect coins (for power-ups & "shopping" in the Prop Shop), and keep your battery charged by collecting new batteries along the way.

Race your friends for the LONGEST "take" ever! What are you waiting for....start SHOOTING that epic film now....


*REQUIRES iPhone 4 or newer, iPod Touch 4th Generation or newer, iPad or iPad Mini
